title: Bug 112458 - Property Editor displays layout item properties when switching to Master Page viewer
description: Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer.
OB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor continues to display the properties of layout items.
EB: Switch to Master Page. Expected result: The Property Editor should change to reflect Master Page properties. Actual result: It still shows the label's properties.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report and insert a label. 2. Select the label. (Property Editor displays label's properties) 3.
